Vanilla BuyCraft

A basic "BuyCraft" implementation written in PHP for vanilla Minecraft servers

About the project

Note: Vanilla BuyCraft's development has been on hiatus since 2017. It may resume development in the future, but focus has been moved to other projects

Vanilla BuyCraft is a library allowing owners of vanilla Minecraft servers to accept donation payments and reward their users. It supports sending commands to the server whenever a transaction is handled. These commands can support placeholders to target specific players when they are ran. Payments are handled with PayPal, and the web server communicates with the Minecraft server using RCON

Disclaimer

This codebase has nothing to do with the official BuyCraft plugin or it's developers. I am simply borrowing the name to help users understand what this does, and what it's for. This is not a wrapper around BuyCraft or it's API. This is a stand-alone project with no real affiliation to BuyCraft
